column4: i have a unix-n00b question: how can i grant write access to my user for a directory in /opt ? sudo chmod username w -R /directoryname/ ?
no idea if that is a good idea at all but would be   sudo chmod u+w -R username dirname     I think
probably.    for   u+w to work you would have to chown to username.  else it would still be root's dir
what do you need that for, probably there is some better solution?
